contentrichtext.text: {{chinesetext}} '''Xiangcheng''' may refer to: *[[Princess Xiangcheng]] (襄城公主; ?–651 CE), daughter of [[Emperor Taizong of Tang]] ==Locations in China== *[[Xiangcheng City]] (项城市), Henan ;Counties *[[Xiangcheng County, Henan]] (襄城县) *[[Xiangcheng County, Sichuan]] (乡城县) ;Districts *[[Xiangcheng District, Suzhou]] (相城区), Jiangsu *[[Xiangcheng District, Xiangyang]] (襄城区), Hubei *[[Xiangcheng District, Zhangzhou]] (芗城区), Fujian ;Towns *[[Xiangcheng, Jiangxi]] (相城镇), in [[Gao'an]] *[[Xiangcheng, Cangshan County]] (向城镇), Shandong *[[Xiangcheng, Zoucheng]] (香城镇), Shandong {{geodis}}
